story.synopsys: In the year 1340, a chilling murder mystery unfolds amidst the backdrop of a dark and vengeful era. Set in the perplexing and treacherous corridors of medieval Europe, this tale of revenge begins with a prominent nobleman found lifeless within the grand halls of his ancestral castle. The Lord's death is shrouded in enigma, as his body exhibits signs of a gruesome death, seemingly enacted with meticulous planning and utmost brutality. Rumors whisper of a long-standing grudge, a vendetta borne out of betrayal and deceit that stretches back through the generations. As the relentless pursuit of justice begins, the murky alliances and concealed secrets of a fractured kingdom are unearthed, revealing a web of deceit and revenge that threatens to embroil all who dare to seek the truth. Amidst the flickering candlelight and impending darkness, the race against time commences, as the valiant investigators navigate through treacherous motives, hidden allegiances, and unexpected allies. Each ominous clue unraveled leads them one step closer to the malevolent force driving this vengeful saga, while the echoing cries for retribution slowly consume the air, leaving no stone unturned and no soul unscathed in their pursuit of bringing justice to this blood-soaked land.
